document.full_text: south korea opened a second investigation in days into a report that the u.s. military dumped toxic chemicals near the capital decades ago, a defense ministry official said on wednesday, threatening to trigger an anti-american backlash.
document.title: south korea probes second report of u.s. army chemical dumping
lines_and_colors: south korea opened a second investigation in days into a report that the u.s. military dumped toxic chemicals near the capital decades ago, a defense ministry official said on wednesday, threatening to trigger an anti-american backlash.
